concept.description: This concept labels the parent Maven POM of a Maven Project with the label RootProject. This is needed to be able to write constraints on the root Maven POM of a Maven project.
concept.cypher: MATCH (rp:Maven:Project:Directory)-[:HAS_PARENT]->(p:Maven:Project) WHERE p.artifactId IN ['jqa-uber-parent', 'jqassistant.plugin.plugin-parent' ] SET rp:RootProject RETURN rp, p
